ad5634d9-7e8f-4590-8f9d-754fe7665ed6.description: The badge earner can translate the medicine and science into best possible patient and client care as a Nutrition Guidelines Champion. The ability to communicate nutritional needs of patients in a way their family can understand - because where there's great communication, theres compliance. Successful badge earners have a unique skillset as a nutrition champion.
ad5634d9-7e8f-4590-8f9d-754fe7665ed6.name: AAHA Nutrition Champion Certificate

issuer.summary: issued by American Animal Hospital Association

badge_template_activities.title: Why Nutrition? Along with temperature, pulse, respiration, and pain, nutrition is the fifth vital assessment of every physical exam. This course is divided into four main modules. Once you’ve completed the course and passed the final quiz, you are officially the newest AAHA Nutrition Champion. In addition to your CE certificate, you will receive a personalized digital badge for use on your website, your email signature, and wherever else you’d like the world to know what you’ve accomplished.
